parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A drinking cup, the contents of the cup; fig: the portion which God allots.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Another form for kathezomai; to seat down, i.e. Set; intransitively, to sit; figuratively, to settle.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
On the right hand, right hand, right. From dechomai; the right side or hand.
And, even, also, namely.
From eu and onoma; properly, well-named, i.e. The left; neuter as adverbial, at the left hand.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Neuter 1st Person Singular
str2: My, mine. From the oblique cases of ego; my.
To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make ready, prepare. From hetoimos; to prepare.
